attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson ability to run the government
attributes.additional_details: Many people are living on the bread line and Boris johnson isn't doing enough to help them ore keeping to any of his promises from cutting peoples lifelines of the 20 uplift to higher income tax and many other reasons
attributes.background: Boris Johnson dose not represent the people of the uk ore listen to other MP's so a vote of no confidence should be put forward and he should be kicked out of parliament ore a new election should happen

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
